title: #126: More Profiling Jerry Sandusky
description:
Listen to Part 2 of the fascinating interview with Scott Paterno, Joe Paterno's son. Please be advised this may be triggering for some who have experienced abuse. 


Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti zero in on what was known at the time and compare and contrast it to what viewers saw in the movie "Paterno", where Joe Paterno is played by Al Pacino.


Jim talks about the critical nine page report that he wrote after profiling perpetrators for three years to identify the warning signs of "nice guy aquaintance" perpetrators. 


This is a must read for everyone if you want to learn how to better protect your children and friends from child sexual vicitmisation.


Show notes

Child Sexual Victimisation Report by Jim Clemente

http://www.paterno.com/Resources/Docs/Background-On-Child-Sexual-Victimization.pdf


If you have been affected by sexual victimisation you can contact:

www.malesurvivor.org

www.stopitnow.org

www.darknesstolight.org

www.safe4athletes.org

1in6.org


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
